video.title: Gran Hotel
video.synopsis: To learn the truth about his sister's mysterious disappearance, a young man infiltrates a hotel in the guise of a footman and begins an investigation.

episodes.synopsis: When Julio Olmedo discovers his sister Cristina has vanished from the Grand Hotel under suspicious circumstances, he poses as a waiter to learn more.
episodes.title: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Julio suspects hotel manager Diego of playing a role in Cristina's disappearance and follows him to Cantaloa, where Julio gains an unexpected ally.
episodes.title: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Javier's lover is found murdered and Inspector Ayala takes over the investigation, while Alicia finds a disturbing letter in Diego's office.
episodes.title: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: Inspector Ayala interrogates Julio about the murder of prostitute Jimena, while Alicia spies on Diego's henchman as he hands over blackmail money.
episodes.title: Part 4

episodes.synopsis: Inspector Ayala finds a knife in Andres's bed and suspects him of Jimena's murder and Cristina's disappearance. Pascual takes Alicia hostage.
episodes.title: Part 5

episodes.synopsis: Julio finds items of Cristina's in Pascual's father's house, and Javier becomes embroiled in a love triangle with the daughter of an important guest.
episodes.title: Part 6

episodes.synopsis: A third murder confirms the work of a serial killer; Javier seduces another daughter of General Herrera, leading to major consequences.
episodes.title: Part 7

episodes.synopsis: The serial killer stabs another woman; in an effort to restore his family's honor, General Herrera challenges Javier to a duel.
episodes.title: Part 8

episodes.synopsis: Javier shows up for his duel with General Herrera and Alicia discovers suspicious activity by Diego on the night that Cristina disappeared.
episodes.title: Part 9

episodes.synopsis: Cristina tells Julio of a letter that contains a secret that would have major implications for the ownership of the Grand Hotel.
episodes.title: Part 10

episodes.synopsis: Cristina wants to force Doña Teresa to hand over the letter, while Julio wants to leave the hotel with his sister, but tragedy kills both plans.
episodes.title: Part 11

episodes.synopsis: Julio becomes determined to solve his sister's murder, while Diego returns to the hotel with the letter, demanding his job and fiancée back.
episodes.title: Part 12

episodes.synopsis: Alicia and Julio's new life together is put on hold when Andres tells Julio that Cristina's death was no accident, and Belen begins a new scheme.
episodes.title: Part 13

episodes.synopsis: While Ayala's investigation centers on Sofia and Doña Teresa presumes the letter to be in Belen's hands, another full moon means another murder.
episodes.title: Part 14

episodes.synopsis: Andrés survives nearly being electrocuted but is still at risk, and Julio discovers his ordeal may have been more than an accident.
episodes.title: Part 15

episodes.synopsis: Doña Teresa tries to ensure that Belen will die giving birth to the child she must give up to Doña Teresa. Then, Belen and Andrés get a surprise.
episodes.title: Part 16

episodes.synopsis: Andrés tells Julio about his and Belén’s secret second son, and Julio tells Alicia about the contents of the letter and the real heir to the hotel.
episodes.title: Part 17

episodes.synopsis: Alicia finds the charred remains of her father's letter, which hold a piece of information that raises more questions than answers.
episodes.title: Part 18

episodes.synopsis: Alfredo makes plans to return to his ancestral home, while Alicia discovers more suspicious facts surrounding her father's death.
episodes.title: Part 19

episodes.synopsis: Julio and Alicia suspect that parties are trying to throw them off the trail in their investigation into Don Carlos's fake death certificate.
episodes.title: Part 20

episodes.synopsis: Alfredo signs a contract securing him as manager, but it comes with a heavy cost, and Javier falls in love with the married Adriana.
episodes.title: Part 21

episodes.synopsis: Julio is blackmailed by his former girlfriend, Cecilia, who threatens to identify him as a murderer, but Julio fights back with a plan of his own.
episodes.title: Part 22

episodes.synopsis: Julio and Alicia meet at the cliffs, unaware they're being watched, and Inspector Ayala finds a shocking discovery in the bones of Don Carlos.
episodes.title: Part 23

episodes.synopsis: Doña Teresa determines to curtail the romance between Javier and Adriana, and the anniversary of Don Carlos's death brings tension.
episodes.title: Part 24

episodes.synopsis: Gonzalo becomes the focus of attention in the death of Don Carlos, while little Juanito becomes a pawn between Diego and Belén.
episodes.title: Part 25

episodes.synopsis: Adriana's grown-up daughter Elena visits with malicious intentions. Alicia finds a weapon that was hidden on the day of Don Carlos's death.
episodes.title: Part 26

episodes.synopsis: Gonzalo is cleared as a suspect by Inspector Ayala, but that doesn't mean he's innocent. A film of Diego and Alicia's wedding reveals a surprise.
episodes.title: Part 27

episodes.synopsis: Julio and Alicia barely manage to escape discovery by the jealous Diego. They find the entrance to a secret room, where they hide.
episodes.title: Part 28

episodes.synopsis: An impending masked ball gives Javier the chance to play devious matchmaker, and a photographer makes potential trouble for Julio and Alicia.
episodes.title: Part 29

episodes.synopsis: Llanes shows up at the masked ball and causes trouble, and Alicia gets caught up in a shooting involving Garrido and Isabel.
episodes.title: Part 30

episodes.synopsis: After Alicia is released, Hernando returns the suitcase with the documents to Diego, but Ayala destroys the incriminating note.
episodes.title: Part 31

episodes.synopsis: Diego confesses his love for Alicia, but she discovers disturbing information about his possible involvement in Don Carlos's death.
episodes.title: Part 32

episodes.synopsis: Alicia and Julio discover new information about the arsenic shipment signed for by Diego, and Sofia is involved in a stabbing death.
episodes.title: Part 33

episodes.synopsis: The news that the Killer with the Golden Knife has struck again lures Don Benjamín back, and the world-famous Houdini challenges Ayala to a wager.
episodes.title: Part 34

episodes.synopsis: Houdini takes a risk that may have him in trouble with Ayala, and Don Benjamín takes revenge on Sofia for the murder of Beatriz with a deadly move.
episodes.title: Part 35

episodes.synopsis: Gonzalo’s lover, Belén, stirs up trouble among the chambermaids and makes devilish plans. Alicia and Julio strive to prove Sofia's innocence.
episodes.title: Part 36

episodes.synopsis: Belén changes her plans surrounding the deed to the Alarcons' mines, and the case against Sofia may not be as solid as Ayala would like.
episodes.title: Part 37

episodes.synopsis: Javier tries to get out of going to war, and to save Sofia, Alicia strikes a deal with Don Benjamín regarding the murder of Beatriz.
episodes.title: Part 38

episodes.synopsis: A shadow descends upon the Grand Hotel when Doña Teresa gets word that Javier has been killed in combat. But Javier has survived.
episodes.title: Part 39

episodes.synopsis: Teresa and Alicia want Andrés to return to the Grand Hotel in exchange for his compliance. Alicia and Julio discover a secret life insurance policy.
episodes.title: Part 40

episodes.synopsis: Quiroga strikes a deal with Alfredo that might have big implications for the hotel, and Javier's court-martial takes a dark turn.
episodes.title: Part 41

episodes.synopsis: Doña Teresa and Diego appear in court to discuss their roles in Don Carlos's death, and New Year's Eve ends with dire indications for the future.
episodes.title: Part 42

episodes.synopsis: An explosion rips through the hotel, leaving many guests dead and injured, including Julio. Meanwhile, Alicia is missing.
episodes.title: Part 43

episodes.synopsis: Sofía poses a threat, as she might confess to Beatriz's murder in trance; Alicia reappears under mysterious conditions in the vicinity of the hotel.
episodes.title: Part 44

episodes.synopsis: Belén tries to regain Andrés's trust; Maite spots a chance to have Alicia's marriage to Diego annulled on grounds of bigamy.
episodes.title: Part 45

episodes.synopsis: Diego announces to the shocked staff that the hotel has been sold and will close within a week; Alfredo wants to buy back his noble title.
episodes.title: Part 46

episodes.synopsis: Alicia and Julio drive to the de Soto estate, where they're captured; Insp. Ayala investigates the disappearance of Celia Velledur.
episodes.title: Part 47

episodes.synopsis: Javier gets cold feet on his wedding day; Maître Cisnero takes Julio under his wing and promotes him to chef de rang.
episodes.title: Part 48

episodes.synopsis: Ezequiel barricades himself in the attic with Maite; Ayala receives an enigmatic message; Javier and Laura go on their honeymoon.
episodes.title: Part 49

episodes.synopsis: Alicia discovers a clue at the reception that helps her decipher the strange message. A difficult guest turns out to be the king's mistress.
episodes.title: Part 50

episodes.synopsis: The hotel hosts a fundraiser for the orphanage planned by Padre Grau; on the terrace, Sofía and Padre Grau exchange a clandestine kiss.
episodes.title: Part 51

episodes.synopsis: Laura won't let up in her efforts to turn Javier into a faithful, caring husband; Julio, Alicia and Maite decipher a clue to a special object.
episodes.title: Part 52

episodes.synopsis: Diego is spotted burying his mother's body; to Ayala's dismay, Chief Inspector Bazán takes over the investigations in the Belén murder case.
episodes.title: Part 53

episodes.synopsis: After Laura learns the details of her husband's future post in Santander, she prevents him from being hired. Meanwhile, Alfredo confronts Padre Grau.
episodes.title: Part 54

episodes.synopsis: Andrés finds and identifies the disfigured corpse of a woman; Alicia discovers Celia Velledur's wallet in her mother's room.
episodes.title: Part 55

episodes.synopsis: Alicia accuses her mother of knowing about Diego's abusive behavior; Diego discovers a passionate love letter signed by his first wife, Marta Santos.
episodes.title: Part 56

episodes.synopsis: Doña Teresa wants Doña Ángela to renege on her statement and promises help for Andrés in return; Sofía's mother-in-law finds the letter to Padre Grau.
episodes.title: Part 57

episodes.synopsis: Andrés is found guilty of Belén’s murder and sentenced to death, to be carried out the following evening. Julio tries to save his friend but fails.
episodes.title: Part 58

episodes.synopsis: To help solve his marital problems, Sofía suggests that Javier see a psychiatrist; Cisneros tells his fake life story to Doña Teresa.
episodes.title: Part 59

episodes.synopsis: Diego keeps Alicia prisoner, trying to get his rival's name; Andrés wants Doña Ángela to give up her position as housekeeper and makes her his heir.
episodes.title: Part 60

episodes.synopsis: Chief Inspector Bazán listens to Ayala's theory about the crimes; Sofía turns her new chambermaid into an ally, and they confront Padre Grau.
episodes.title: Part 61

episodes.synopsis: Julio has barely regained consciousness when he's in mortal danger again; after spending the night with Sofía, Alfredo insists that she leave.
episodes.title: Part 62

episodes.synopsis: Andrés is slowly beginning to have doubts about Belén; Cisneros's sister shoots Diego and frames Alicia for the crime.
episodes.title: Part 63

episodes.synopsis: Diego wants to make a statement before the judge, but he collapses; cholera breaks out at the hotel; Cisneros convinces Doña Teresa that he loves her.
episodes.title: Part 64

episodes.synopsis: Alicia is released; the cholera epidemic forces the hotel to go on lockdown; Ayala tells Diego that he knows about his real identity.
episodes.title: Part 65

episodes.synopsis: After a dinner that Julio and Andrés have arranged for the four friends, Maite and Andrés exchange a kiss; Cisneros carries out his revenge on Diego.
episodes.title: Part 66
